notes: clean vector-like shapes, soft gradients minimal
thick friendly outline, high contrast text areas

assets.prompt: A cute flat pastel cartoon vertical mobile game background for toddlers (ages 2-5). Soft sky gradient, rounded clouds, subtle floating bubbles and confetti shapes, lots of empty space in the center for UI, no text, clean and cheerful, Indonesian kids vibe but subtle.
assets.negative: text, watermark, logo, realistic, dark, scary, clutter, low contrast

assets.prompt: Flat pastel cartoon icon (512x512) for a toddler mini-game: popping balloons. A big smiling balloon with sparkle pop effect, thick friendly outline, simple shapes, centered, no text.
Flat pastel cartoon icon for toddler mini-game: drag and match shapes. Two cute shapes (circle and square) with a dotted drag path and a small hand cursor, thick friendly outline, centered, no text.
Flat pastel cartoon icon for toddler mini-game: memory card flip. Two rounded cards, one face down with a star, one face up with a cute animal silhouette, thick friendly outline, centered, no text.
Flat pastel cartoon icon for toddler mini-game: animal piano. Small colorful piano keys with a cute animal face (e.g., cat) above it, thick friendly outline, centered, no text.
Flat pastel cartoon icon for toddler mini-game: finger painting. A cute paint palette with a big colorful finger swipe stroke, thick friendly outline, centered, no text.
Flat pastel cartoon icon for toddler mini-game: shape silhouette matching. A cute silhouette slot with a matching shape hovering near it, thick friendly outline, centered, no text.
Flat pastel cartoon icon for toddler mini-game: coloring book. A simple line-art page with a big crayon coloring part of it, thick friendly outline, centered, no text.
Flat pastel cartoon icon for toddler mini-game: music rhythm. Musical notes and a bouncing beat bar with sparkles, thick friendly outline, centered, no text.

A cute flat pastel cartoon mascot inspired by Indonesian wayang, simplified for toddlers: big friendly eyes, smiling, rounded shapes, thick outline, front-facing, full body, on transparent background, no text.
assets.negative: text, watermark, scary, sharp edges, realistic
